API Integration

API enablement: Tips, tools and best practices to get you there:

Preparing for Digital Platform Implementation

Get whitepaper
X

Webinar Overview - Duration 1.5 hours

Banking industry has too change, let’s see how, join us as we speak about this in detail!

Pratik Dasmohapatra

For Pekin Insurance, pursuing an API-based enterprise integration is a key component of their digital transformation. With the goal of creating an integration culture that enables applications to be developed faster, scaled on demand and centrally managed, Pekin leveraged the API tools from MuleSoft and frameworks and advice from their vendor partners to enable their organization for digital success.

Join us in this webinar featuring Pekin Insurance CIO Subhasish Mukherjee, Novarica's VP of Research and Consulting Martin Higgins, and MuleSoft's Regional Sales Director Nate Riddle to learn

What you’ll learn from the speakers

  • Although enterprise leaders are the ultimate decision makers in cloud adoption it is the entire team that will bring cloud to fruition.
  • Not having a strategy to develop people and the processes in place to communicate, train and manage them can lead to misuse of cloud capabilities and resources.
  • Not having a strategy to develop people and the processes in place to communicate, train and manage them can lead to misuse of cloud capabilities and resources.

The Digital Age is profoundly disrupting virtually every sector of our economy, our culture and our lives. The insurance industry is no exception.
